titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 22) proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to voluntary prayer in the schools.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 2/23/1993--Introduced. Set forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 22 (voluntary prayer in public schools).
